entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
